Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier delay at Rockwell. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier delay at Rockwell.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/Polk
ShortDescription: #52 buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Arthington, Homan, Jackson, and Kedzie, due to police activity Kedzie/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Arthington, Homan, Jackson, and Kedzie, due to police activity Kedzie/Polk.

Allow extra travel time.
